about.title: FullStack Developer
about.about: I am a fullstack developer residing in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India.
about.about_work: As a passionate Full-stack developer, I specialize in creating robust and scalable web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries. With deep expertise in frontend technologies like React, Next.js, Redux, and backend frameworks such as Node.js and Express.js, I am well-versed in building seamless user interfaces and efficient server-side applications. I thrive on solving complex problems, optimizing performance, and delivering high-quality solutions that meet business needs. Whether it's building a responsive frontend or a powerful backend API, I enjoy leveraging my technical skills to create impactful digital experiences. Connect with me to explore, how I can bring value to your next project!

desc: Completed Master in Computer Application from KNIT, Sultanpur.
Familiar with software development methodologies and project management practices, including Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
Worked on web application development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designing a database system using SQL
Familiarity with Machine Learning, Neural Networks and Soft Computing methodologies.
Completed certification course O level provided by NEILIT Society, India.
Familiarity with web development technologies HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
Familiarity with Programming language C and C++.
Completed Bachelor in Science from DDUGU, Gorakhpur.
Implemented a fully customizable UI architecture which helps the user to easily create custom forms according to their requirements just by drag-n-drop.
Implemented an automation system based on specific triggers and conditions for automated data transfer among various modules and pipelines in the software.
Responsible for creating dynamic and reusable base components which runs on config driven ui and helps in making unanimous design across our platform.
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate api enabling efficient data communication and synchronization.
